works.title: Store Coordinator
works.company: Constru Sans - Santa Barbara d'Oeste, Brazil
works.description:
Family-owned construction material store, acted in many areas of the company over the years, including:

Daily customer service, selling, after-sales.

Prospecting new suppliers, products, potential clients, market sales prices.

Layout organization, restocking, assembling POS materials, support on the delivery team.

Monthly sales reports to ownership.

Worked on the transition to the new ownership from August/19 to December/19.
